meanings.definition: Surgeons who are exceptionally skilled and experienced in their field.
meanings.sent1: The supersurgeons team successfully completed the complex surgery.
meanings.sent2: The hospital hired supersurgeons to lead the advanced surgical unit.
meanings.sent3: The supersurgeons' steady hands were so precise that they could probably perform surgery blindfolded!
meanings.sent4: Her meticulous attention to detail made her the supersurgeons of the sewing world.
meanings.sent5: The supersurgeons' reputation for excellence spread far and wide.

meanings.definition: A group of highly specialized medical professionals known for their exceptional surgical abilities.
meanings.sent1: The supersurgeons were called in to perform the life-saving operation.
meanings.sent2: Patients traveled from across the country to seek treatment from the supersurgeons.
meanings.sent3: The supersurgeons' operating room was like a well-oiled machine, with everyone working in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent4: In the world of medicine, she was considered one of the supersurgeons, with a success rate that was unmatched.
meanings.sent5: The hospital proudly displayed a wall of fame featuring the supersurgeons who had made history.
